mapper.select: select * from i_information where 1=1 and iadress=#{adress}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO i_information (IID, IContent, IImage, IAdress, IDate, IStatus, IUserId, IInformation2, IInformation3) values (#{IID},#{IContent},#{IImage},#{IAdress},#{IDate}, #{IStatus},#{IUserId},#{IInformation2},#{IInformation3})
mapper.select: select c.iid,c.icontent,c.iimage,c.iadress,c.idate,c.istatus,c.iuserid, c.mid,c.mkuserid,c.mkmessageid,c.mpraise1,c.mpraise2,a.iid,a.mowneruser,a.mtargetuser,a.mcontent,a.mlikecount, a.mcreatedAt,a.mparent,a.mparenttype from (select * from i_information i left join m_praise mp on i.iid=mp.MKMessageID where i.iid=#{IID}) c left join (SELECT MInformationID iid,mc.* from m_comment mc right join (select MKCommentID,MInformationID from m_message_comment_relation where MInformationID=#{IID}) b on mc.mid = b.MKCommentID) a on a.iid=c.iid
